nodes.bodyText: We should be able to remove PartitionerConsistentHash altogether.
This is kind of outdated, the test should iterate over the segments and check the owners of each segment instead.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -148,7 +148,7 @@ public boolean isSatisfied() throws Exception {
       ConsistentHash ch = cache(a0).getAdvancedCache().getDistributionManager().getReadConsistentHash();

nodes.bodyText: I think the parameter should be the KP, not the CH.
